document_data.caption: A map showing Lake Otta in western Gnarhelm.
document_data.name: Lake Otta
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Otta''' was a small freshwater lake located in western [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Lake Otta was found just east of [[Hardangheight]] near the shore of the [[Sea of Moonshae]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The village of [[Otta]] was found along Lake Otta's northern shore.
